channel.title: Secret Science Sewer Siblings: The Mutants Take Manhattan (GCOG One Shot)
channel.description: **Secret Science Sewer Siblings: The Mutants Take Manhattan (GCOG One Shot)** Starring: @GroupSoliloquy, @DavidMK, @Donogh, and Eleanor H A one-shot of Secret Science Sewer Siblings, a game of teenage mutant ninja critters. Can the four siblings rescue their mentor from spacefaring, laser-wielding sewer sharks? And will they have to unexpectedly headline a rock concert at the aquarium along the way? https://youtu.be/LPJf_T6H6Qk

item.title: Secret Science Sewer Siblings: The Mutants Take Manhattan (GCOG One Shot)

item.description:
@Alexi_Sarge wrote:

Secret Science Sewer Siblings: The Mutants Take Manhattan (GCOG One Shot)
Starring: @GroupSoliloquy, @DavidMK, @Donogh, and Eleanor H
A one-shot of Secret Science Sewer Siblings, a game of teenage mutant ninja critters. Can the four siblings rescue their mentor from spacefaring, laser-wielding sewer sharks? And will they have to unexpectedly headline a rock concert at the aquarium along the way?
